document_data.name: Serphidian
document_data.mainbody: '''Serphidians''' were specialty priests devoted to [[Sseth]], the World Serpent.
document_data.Activities: Serphidians spent much of their time hunting or courting government officials to widen their sphere of corruption.
document_data.Abilities:
These individuals were always [[human]]s, [[ophidian]]s, [[spirit naga]]s, [[yuan-ti]] (with the exception of [[histachii]]), or any other reptilian race. Regardless of their race, all serphidians' eyes became slitted like a [[snake]] as soon as they joined the priesthood.

Serphidians were immune to every type of reptilian venom. They also gained immunity to all poisons as they progressed through the ranks. Serphidians also enjoyed a variety of magical abilities including ''[[speak with animals|speak with reptiles]], [[sleep]], [[sticks to snakes]], [[snake skin]], [[animal summoning II]],'' and ''[[vipergout]]''. Particularly powerful serphidians could ''[[shapechange]]'' into a [[Constrictor snake|giant constrictor snake]], [[boalisk]], or [[amphisbaena]].
document_data.Possessions: Serphidians typically wore [[scale mail]]. They were not restricted in the type of weapons they could wield.
